      • getGlobalTrafficCounters

        public org.json.JSONObject getGlobalTrafficCounters(java.lang.String counterTitle)
                                             throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                                    org.json.JSONException,
                                                    java.io.IOException,
                                                    java.lang.RuntimeException
        List of global traffic counters in the controller (across all switches).
        Parameters:
        counterTitle -
        "all" or something of the form DPID_COUNTER_NAME_SUB_CATEGORY ie.
        00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01_OFPacketIn_broadcast (SUB_CATEGORY being "broadcast")
        00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01_OFPacketIn_L3_ARP (SUB_CATEGORY being "L3_ARP")
        L3 sub_categories take the form "L3_etherType", L4 sub_categories take the form "L4_protocol"
        For more details look at net.floodlightcontroller.counter.CounterStore.java
        Returns:
        global traffic counters in the controller (across all switches)
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • getSwitchTrafficCounters

        public org.json.JSONObject getSwitchTrafficCounters(java.lang.String switchId,
                                           java.lang.String counterName)
                                             throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                                    java.io.IOException,
                                                    java.lang.RuntimeException,
                                                    org.json.JSONException
        List of traffic counters per switch
        Parameters:
        switchId - Valid Switch DPID
        counterName -
        "all" or something of the form DPID_COUNTER_NAME_SUB_CATEGORY ie.
        00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01_OFPacketIn_broadcast (SUB_CATEGORY being "broadcast")
        00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01_OFPacketIn_L3_ARP (SUB_CATEGORY being "L3_ARP")
        L3 sub_categories take the form "L3_etherType", L4 sub_categories take the form "L4_protocol"
        For more details look at net.floodlightcontroller.counter.CounterStore.java
        Returns:
        traffic counters per switch
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        org.json.JSONException

                                       throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                              java.io.IOException,
                                              java.lang.RuntimeException,
                                              org.json.JSONException
        List all the inter-switch links.

        all the inter-switch links

      • getRoute

        public org.json.JSONArray getRoute(java.lang.String srcId,
                          int srcPort,
                          java.lang.String dstId,
                          int dstPort)
                            throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                   org.json.JSONException,
                                   java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.RuntimeException
        Provides a route between srcPort on src and dstPort on dst.
        Not list in REST API page, but appears in CircuitPusher.py
        Parameters:
        srcId - src Switch DPID
        srcPort -
        dstId - dst Switch DPID
        dstPort -
        Returns:
        a route between srcPort on srcSwitch and dstPort on dstSwitch
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • getDevices

        public org.json.JSONArray getDevices(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paraMap)
                              throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                     java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.RuntimeException,
                                     org.json.JSONException
        List of all devices (i.e. hosts, etc) tracked by the controller.
        This includes MACs, IPs, and attachment points.
        Parameters:
        paraMap - Map of parameters to filter the devices

        Passed as GET parameters:
        mac (colon-separated hex-encoded),
        ipv4 (dotted decimal),
        vlan,
        dpid (attachment point DPID) (colon-separated hex-encoded),
        port (the attachment point port).
        Returns:
        all devices (i.e. hosts, etc) tracked by the controller
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        org.json.JSONException

      • getDevices

        public org.json.JSONArray getDevices(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.String value)
                              throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                     java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.RuntimeException,
                                     org.json.JSONException
        List of all devices (i.e. hosts, etc) tracked by the controller.
        This includes MACs, IPs, and attachment points.

        Parameters to filter the devices are listed below:
        mac (colon-separated hex-encoded),
        ipv4 (dotted decimal),
        vlan,
        dpid (attachment point DPID) (colon-separated hex-encoded),
        port (the attachment point port).
        Parameters:
        key - Parameter key to filter the devices
        value - Parameter value to filter the devices
        Returns:
        all devices (i.e. hosts, etc) tracked by the controller
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        org.json.JSONException

      • addFlow

        public org.json.JSONObject addFlow(java.lang.String name,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paraMap)
                            throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                   java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.RuntimeException,
                                   org.json.JSONException
        General method to add a static flow entry
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the flow entry, this is the primary key, it MUST be unique
        paraMap - key/value pairs for flow entry, check here for details.
        Returns:
        if add OK, return JSONObject {"status":"Entry pushed"}
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        org.json.JSONException

      • addIPv4Flow

        public org.json.JSONObject addIPv4Flow(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String switchId,
                              java.lang.String srcIp,
                              java.lang.String dstIp,
                              int outputPort)
                                throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                       java.io.IOException,
                                       java.lang.RuntimeException,
                                       org.json.JSONException
        Simple method to add static IPv4 flow entry
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the flow entry, this is the primary key, it MUST be unique
        switchId - ID of the switch (data path) that this rule should be added to xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx
        srcIp - xx.xx.xx.xx
        dstIp - xx.xx.xx.xx
        outputPort - port number to output
        Returns:
        if add OK, return JSONObject {"status":"Entry pushed"}
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        org.json.JSONException
